N

Notify all the Observers in the Observers List for temperature, humidity and tension.

O

S

sendMessage(String) - Method in class br.inf.ufes.lar.thtbot.monitors.Monitor
Sends Telegram's messages to a chat through a Telegram's bot.
setStats() - Method in class br.inf.ufes.lar.thtbot.THTMonitorBot
Reads the stats from the stats page, updates the temperature, humidity and tension instances and notify all the observers about the changes made to it.

This class is responsible to fetch all the stats generate by the monitor source.
THTMonitorBot(String) - Constructor for class br.inf.ufes.lar.thtbot.THTMonitorBot
